verses.verse: And it shall come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, if thou shalt hearken <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> thee on <S%H5945>high<s%> above all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

and all these <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5381>thee<s%>, and overtake <S%H8085>thee<s%>, if thou shalt hearken unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shalt thou be in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>beasts<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be thy <S%H2935>basket<s%> and thy <S%H4863>kneading-trough<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> shalt thou be when thou goest <S%H3318>out<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against thee to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> before <S%H6440>thee<s%>: they shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> against thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon thee in thy <S%H618>barns<s%>, and in all that thou <S%H4916>puttest<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1288>unto<s%>; and he will bless thee in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H6965>establish<s%> thee for a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H7650>himself<s%>, as he hath sworn unto <S%H8104>thee<s%>; if thou shalt keep the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that thou art <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and they shall be afraid of <S%H3372>thee<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will make thee <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H6605>open<s%> unto thee his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> in its <S%H6256>season<s%>, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H3867>lend<s%> unto <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H3867>borrow<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> thee the <S%H7218>head<s%>, and not the <S%H2180>tail<s%>; and thou shalt be above <S%H4605>only<s%>, and thou shalt not be <S%H4295>beneath<s%>; if thou shalt <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to do <S%H6213>them<s%>,

and shalt not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> from any of the <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to serve <S%H5647>them<s%>.

But it shall come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, if thou wilt not hearken unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that all these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5381>thee<s%>, and overtake thee.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shalt thou be in the <S%H7704>field<s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be thy <S%H2935>basket<s%> and thy <S%H4863>kneading-trough<s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H990>body<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shalt thou be when thou comest <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> shalt thou be when thou goest <S%H3318>out<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> upon thee <S%H3994>cursing<s%>, <S%H4103>discomfiture<s%>, and <S%H4045>rebuke<s%>, in all that thou <S%H4916>puttest<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto to <S%H6213>do<s%>, until thou be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>, and until thou <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%>; <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of thy <S%H4611>doings<s%>, whereby thou hast forsaken <S%H5800>me<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will make the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H3615>thee<s%>, until he have consumed thee from off the <S%H127>land<s%>, whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with <S%H7829>consumption<s%>, and with <S%H6920>fever<s%>, and with <S%H1816>inflammation<s%>, and with fiery <S%H2746>heat<s%>, and with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with <S%H7711>blasting<s%>, and with <S%H3420>mildew<s%>; and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> thee until thou <S%H6>perish<s%>.
And thy <S%H8064>heaven<s%> that is over thy <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is under thee shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%>: from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall it come <S%H3381>down<s%> upon <S%H8045>thee<s%>, until thou be destroyed.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> thee to be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>; thou shalt go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> against <S%H5127>them<s%>, and shalt flee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2189>them<s%>: and thou shalt be tossed to and from among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And thy dead <S%H5038>body<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> unto all <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and unto the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and there shall be none to frighten them <S%H2729>away<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with the <S%H7822>boil<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and with the <S%H2914>emerods<s%>, and with the <S%H1618>scurvy<s%>, and with the <S%H2775>itch<s%>, whereof thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> not be <S%H7495>healed<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with <S%H7697>madness<s%>, and with <S%H5788>blindness<s%>, and with <S%H8541>astonishment<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>;

and thou shalt <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>, as the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H4959>gropeth<s%> in <S%H653>darkness<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>: and thou shalt be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H3117>alway<s%>, and there shall be none to save <S%H3467>thee<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H1129>her<s%>: thou shalt build a <S%H1004>house<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5193>therein<s%>: thou shalt plant a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and shalt not use the fruit <S%H2490>thereof<s%>.

Thine <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slain<s%> before thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2543>thereof<s%>: thine ass shall be violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> from before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, and shall not be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H6629>thee<s%>: thy sheep shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and thou shalt have none to save <S%H3467>thee<s%>.

Thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>; and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%>, and <S%H3616>fail<s%> with longing for them all the <S%H3117>day<s%>: and there shall be nought in the <S%H410>power<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, and all thy <S%H3018>labors<s%>, shall a <S%H5971>nation<s%> which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not eat <S%H398>up<s%>; and thou shalt be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3117>alway<s%>;
so that thou shalt be <S%H7696>mad<s%> for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> which thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee in the <S%H1290>knees<s%>, and in the <S%H7785>legs<s%>, with a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>boil<s%>, whereof thou canst <S%H3201>not<s%> be <S%H7495>healed<s%>, from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> unto the crown of thy <S%H6936>head<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H3212>bring<s%> <S%H4428>thee<s%>, and thy king whom thou shalt <S%H6965>set<s%> over <S%H1471>thee<s%>, unto a nation that thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%>, thou nor thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and there shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>.

And thou shalt become an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%>, a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, and a <S%H8148>byword<s%>, among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> whither <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall lead thee <S%H5090>away<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and shalt <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H622>in<s%>; for the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall consume <S%H2628>it<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H5647>dress<s%> <S%H8354>them<s%>, but thou shalt neither drink of the <S%H3196>wine<s%>, nor <S%H103>gather<s%> the <S%H8438>grapes<s%>; for the worm shall eat <S%H398>them<s%>.

Thou shalt have <S%H2132>olive-trees<s%> throughout all thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>, but thou shalt not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> thyself with the <S%H8081>oil<s%>; for thine <S%H2132>olive<s%> shall cast its <S%H5394>fruit<s%>.
Thou shalt <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, but they shall not be <S%H3212>thine<s%>; for they shall go into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.
All thy <S%H6086>trees<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%> shall the <S%H6767>locust<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%>.

The <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> that is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee shall mount <S%H5927>up<s%> above thee <S%H4605>higher<s%> and <S%H4605>higher<s%>; and thou shalt come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4295>lower<s%> and <S%H4295>lower<s%>.
He shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to <S%H3867>thee<s%>, and thou shalt not lend to <S%H7218>him<s%>: he shall be the head, and thou shalt be the <S%H2180>tail<s%>.

And all these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H7291>thee<s%>, and shall pursue <S%H5381>thee<s%>, and overtake <S%H8045>thee<s%>, till thou be destroyed; because thou <S%H8085>hearkenedst<s%> not unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which he commanded <S%H6680>thee<s%>:
and they shall be upon thee for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H4159>wonder<s%>, and upon thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Because thou <S%H5647>servedst<s%> not <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8057>joyfulness<s%>, and with <S%H2898>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, by reason of the abundance of all <S%H7230>things<s%>;

therefore shalt thou <S%H5647>serve<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> against <S%H7458>thee<s%>, in hunger, and in <S%H6772>thirst<s%>, and in <S%H5903>nakedness<s%>, and in <S%H2640>want<s%> of all <S%H5414>things<s%>: and he shall put a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> upon thy <S%H6677>neck<s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045>thee<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5375>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> against thee from <S%H7350>far<s%>, from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1675>flieth<s%>; a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>tongue<s%> thou shalt not <S%H8085>understand<s%>;

a <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, that shall not <S%H5375>regard<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H2205>old<s%>, nor show <S%H2603>favor<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%>,

and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thy <S%H127>ground<s%>, until thou be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>; that also shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> thee <S%H1715>grain<s%>, new <S%H8492>wine<s%>, or <S%H3323>oil<s%>, the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of thy <S%H504>cattle<s%>, or the <S%H6251>young<s%> of thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>, until they have caused thee to <S%H6>perish<s%>.

And they shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> thee in all thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>, until thy <S%H1364>high<s%> and <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%>, <S%H2004>wherein<s%> thou <S%H982>trustedst<s%>, throughout all thy <S%H776>land<s%>; and they shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> thee in all thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> throughout all thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath given <S%H5414>thee<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of thine own <S%H990>body<s%>, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4692>thee<s%>, in the siege and in the <S%H4689>distress<s%> wherewith thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall distress <S%H6693>thee<s%>.

The <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7390>tender<s%> among <S%H3966>you<s%>, and very <S%H6028>delicate<s%>, his <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and toward the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and toward the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> whom he hath <S%H3498>remaining<s%>;

so that he will not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of them of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> whom he shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, because he hath nothing <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4692>him<s%>, in the siege and in the <S%H4689>distress<s%> wherewith thine <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> thee in all thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

The <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate<s%> woman among <S%H5254>you<s%>, who would not adventure to <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> for <S%H6026>delicateness<s%> and <S%H7391>tenderness<s%>, her <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward the <S%H376>husband<s%> of her <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and toward her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and toward her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>,

and toward her young <S%H7988>one<s%> that cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> from between her <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and toward her <S%H1121>children<s%> whom she shall <S%H3205>bear<s%>; for she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them for <S%H2640>want<s%> of all things <S%H5643>secretly<s%>, in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> and in the <S%H6693>distress<s%> wherewith thine <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> thee in thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>.

then <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6381>make<s%> thy <S%H4347>plagues<s%> <S%H6381>wonderful<s%>, and the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, even <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>plagues<s%>, and of long <S%H539>continuance<s%>, and <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H2483>sicknesses<s%>, and of long <S%H539>continuance<s%>.
And he will <S%H7725>bring<s%> upon thee again all the <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, which thou wast <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%>; and they shall cleave unto <S%H1692>thee<s%>.

And ye shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4962>number<s%>, <S%H834>whereas<s%> ye were as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; because thou didst not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3068>pass<s%>, that, as Jehovah <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> over you to do you <S%H3190>good<s%>, and to <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, so Jehovah will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> over you to cause you to <S%H6>perish<s%>, and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5255>you<s%>; and ye shall be plucked from off the <S%H127>land<s%> whither thou <S%H935>goest<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> thee among all <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even unto the <S%H7097>other<s%> end of the <S%H5647>earth<s%>; and there thou shalt serve <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which thou hast not <S%H3045>known<s%>, thou nor thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, even <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>.

and thy <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H8511>hang<s%> in doubt <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H6342>thee<s%>; and thou shalt fear <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3119>day<s%>, and shalt have no <S%H539>assurance<s%> of thy <S%H2416>life<s%>.

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, Would it <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%>! and at <S%H6153>even<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%>, Would it <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%>! for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of thy <S%H3824>heart<s%> which thou shalt <S%H6343>fear<s%>, and for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of thine <S%H4758>eyes<s%> which thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H7725>bring<s%> thee into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> with <S%H591>ships<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> whereof I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>thee<s%>, Thou shalt see it no more <S%H3254>again<s%>: and there ye shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> yourselves unto your <S%H341>enemies<s%> for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and for <S%H8198>bondwomen<s%>, and no man shall buy <S%H7069>you<s%>.
